all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

G.title: Filters Subject
G.description: The subject of this filter test.

E.title: Filters Clock Time
E.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000]

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000]

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

H.title: Filters Distance To Nearest Player
H.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

I.title: Filters Has Ability
I.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

J.title: Filters Has Biome Tag
J.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

BA.title: Filters Has Component
BA.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

BB.title: Filters Has Container Open
BB.description: Returns true when the subject Player entity has opened a container.

BD.title: Entity Damage Source
BD.description: The types of damage an entity can receive

BC.title: Filters Has Damage
BC.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type.

BE.title: Filters Has Equipment
BE.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for
value.title: TODO Title

BG.title: Filters Has Mob Effect
BG.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

BH.title: Filters Has Ranged Weapon
BH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is holding a ranged weapon like a bow or crossbow.

BI.title: Filters Has Tag
BI.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

BJ.title: Filters Has Target
BJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity has a valid target.

CA.title: Filters Has Trade Supply
CA.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

CB.title: Filters Hourly Clock Time
CB.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000]

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000]

CC.title: In block
CC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

CD.title: Filters In Caravan
CD.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

CE.title: Filters In Clouds
CE.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

CF.title: Filters In Lava
CF.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

CG.title: Filters In Nether
CG.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Nether.

CH.title: Filters In Water
CH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

CI.title: Filters In Water Or Rain
CI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

CJ.title: In contact with water
CJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

DA.title: Filters Inactivity Timer
DA.description: Tests if the specified duration in seconds of inactivity for despawning has been reached.

value.description: The Family name to look for
value.title: Value

DB.title: Filters Is Altitude
DB.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with
value.title: Value

DC.title: Filters Is Avoiding Mobs
DC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

DD.title: Filters Is Biome
DD.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

DE.title: Filters Is Block
DE.description: Returns true when the block has the given name.

value.description: The Family name to look for
value.title: Value

DF.title: Filters Is Brightness
DF.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

value.description: The brightness value to compare with.
value.title: Value

DG.title: Filters Is Climbing
DG.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

DH.title: Filters Is Color
DH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

DI.title: Filters Is Daytime
DI.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

DJ.title: Filters Is Difficulty
DJ.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

value.description: The game's difficulty level to test
value.title: Value

EA.title: Filters Is Family
EA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

value.description: The Family name to look for
value.title: Value

value.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.
value.title: Value

EC.title: Filters Is Humid
EC.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity

ED.title: Filters Is Immobile
ED.description: Returns true if the subject entity is immobile. An entity is immobile if it lacks AI goals, has just changed dimensions or if it is a mob and has no health.

EE.title: Filters Is In Village
EE.description: Tests whether the Subject is inside the bounds of a village.

EF.title: Filters Is Leashed
EF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is leashed.

EG.title: Filters Is Leashed To
EG.description: Returns true if the subject entity leashed to the calling entity.

EH.title: Filters Is Mark Variant
EH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the mark variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with
value.title: Value

EI.title: Filters Is Moving
EI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is moving.

EJ.title: Filters Is Owner
EJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the owner of the calling entity.

FA.title: Filters Is Persistent
FA.description: Tests if the subject's persistence matches the bool value passed in.

FB.title: Filters Is Riding
FB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding on another entity.

FC.title: Filters Is Skin Id
FC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the skin id number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with
value.title: Value

FD.title: Filters Is Sleeping
FD.description: Tests whether the Subject is sleeping.

FE.title: Filters Is Sneaking
FE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sneaking.

FF.title: Filters Is Snow Covered
FF.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with snow cover

FG.title: Filters Is Target
FG.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the target of the calling entity.

FH.title: Filters Is Target
FH.description: Tests whether the current temperature is a given type.

value.description: The Biome temperature catagory to test
value.title: Value

FI.title: Filters Is Temperature Value
FI.description: Tests the current temperature against a provided value in the range (0.0, 1.0) where 0.0f is the coldest temp and 1.0f is the hottest.

value.description: The Biome temperature value to compare with.
value.title: Value

FJ.title: Filters Is Underground
FJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is underground. An entity is considered underground if there are non-solid blocks above it.

GA.title: Filters Is Underwater
GA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is under water. An entity is considered underwater if it is completely submerged in water blocks.

GB.title: Filters Is Variant
GB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with
value.title: Value

GC.title: Filters Is Visible
GC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is visible.

GD.title: Filters Light Level
GD.description: Tests is the mob is outside of the specified light level range (0, 16).

GE.title: Filters Moon Intensity
GE.description: Compares the current moon intensity with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0)

GF.title: Filters Moon Phase
GF.description: Compares the current moon phase with an integer value in the range (0, 7).

GG.title: Filters On Ground
GG.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on ground.

GH.title: Filters On Ladder
GH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on a ladder.

GI.title: Filters Random Chance
GI.description: Returns true if the random chance rolls 0 out of a specified max range.

GJ.title: Filters Rider Count
GJ.description: Returns the number of riders on this entity.

HA.title: Filters Surface Mob
HA.description: Tests if the subject is a surface mob.

HB.title: Filters Trusts
HB.description: Returns true if the subject is trusted by entity.

HC.title: Filters Weather
HC.description: Tests the current weather in the dimension against a provided weather value.

value.description: The Family name to look for
value.title: Value

HD.title: Filters Weather At Position
HD.description: Tests the current weather, at the actor's position, against a provided weather value.

value.description: The Family name to look for
value.title: Value

min.description: This is the minimum light level value that allows the mob to spawn
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum light level value that allows the mob to spawn
max.title: Max

adjust_for_weather.description: This determines if weather can affect the light level conditions that cause the mob to spawn (e.g. Allowing hostile mobs to spawn during the day when it rains.)
adjust_for_weather.title: Adjust For Weather

surface.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable on the surface
surface.title: Surface

underground.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable underground
underground.title: Underground

min.description: This is the minimum difficulty level that a mob spawns
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum difficulty level that a mob spawns
max.title: Max

min_size.description: This is the minimum number of mobs that spawn in a herd
min_size.title: Min Size

max_size.description: This is the maximum number of mobs that spawn in a herd
max_size.title: Max Size

event.description: This is an event that can be triggered from spawning
event.title: Event

event_skip_count.description: This is the number of mobs spawned before the specified event is triggered
event_skip_count.title: Event Skip Count

BDB.title: Format Version
BDB.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
